#summary Other existing Synergy projects and their status

== Synergy2 == 
  * Detail: Original project
  * Status: abandon-ware
  * Latest commit: No SVN change in 2+ years
  * Latest release: April 2, 2006 (as of May 23, 2009)
  * Relation: Integrated/Fork-origin

== QSynergy ==
  * About: QT GUI for Synergy
  * Homepage: http://www.volker-lanz.de/en/software/qsynergy/
  * Platform: Windows, Mac OS X, Linux
  * Author: Volker Lanz, agreed to help up integration QSynergy into Synergy+

== QuickSynergy ==
  * Homepage: http://quicksynergy.sourceforge.net/
  * Last change: 2006
  * Platform: MacOS

== Sinerji ==
